home.demoDescription: Privacy-first federated learning for medical imaging on Calimero private shards. Train AI models collaboratively without sharing patient data.
home.calimeroIntro: Calimero is a privacy-focused blockchain network that enables developers to build scalable, private applications. Our platform provides the infrastructure for creating decentralized applications with enhanced privacy and performance.

description.title: Welcome to MediNet
description.subtitle: Privacy-first federated learning for medical imaging
features: Collaborate on AI model training without sharing raw patient data
Secure aggregation on Calimero private shards
Distribute improved global models back to participants
description.getStarted: Connect your wallet to get started
